/torrents/ I would like to share with you some mp4 lectures to educate you guys for exams. Water Faculties became harder beacause of this new professor that grades us so hard. He doesnt send hes materials to us , so I had to make torrents to make it easier to pass. Idk Grab some a.pm/87t6uf456udbry546 , mega.nz/water/y65fuyiy566y , magnet::nz=&654ruyuiy76tr54ydtrfyu76
my man , you are mine salvation. I was so scared of this exam , but now I can finally study. Thank you so much
Billions must watch

/spr/ - Welcome to our college new students :3. Its is your first year at this school? Make yourself at home and begin an amazing journey with us. We are here to help you with everything you need. If you have any questions , just ask us. We are here to help you.
PS: Don't forget to check our /spr/ board for more information and resources.
Thank you for the warm welcome! I'm excited to start my journey here. Any tips for a first-year student?
Welcome! Don't be afraid to ask questions and get involved in campus activities. It's a great way to meet new people and make the most of your college experience.
Don't forget to check out the library and join some clubs. They are great for meeting people and learning new things.
